name: Mounts Bay Waters Apartment Hotel

reviews.text: I have just spent a 10 night business trip to Perth and this is a great place to stay. Pretty much everything is within a 10 minute walk be it the CBD, the ferry docks or Kings Park whilst the train station is about a 15 minute walk.
reviews.title: Spacious apartment in excellent location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartment itself was very spacious and clean with a useful kitchen area with all necessary utensils. The bed was very comfy with nice linen and the only slight disappointment would be that the bathroom was somewhat basic but functional none-the-less.
reviews.title: great svisit to Perth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The complex has a 24 hour reception (useful for my 1am arrival), a restaurant and sports facilities (although being there mid winter I only used the gym). The gym is a little basic but if you really want a challenge have a run up the nearby "Jacobs Ladder" steps up to Kings Park. It'll get the blood pumping.
reviews.title: great accommodation in a good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'd definitely recommend this apart-hotel for anyone needing a longer stay solution.
reviews.title: pleasant self contained apartment hotel
Over-priced and awful experience
reviews.text: my husband went on buisness trip to Perth so I have joined him and stayed with him in Mounts Bay Waters.Location! Location! Location!-just a very good central Perth location. very good value!Wevenjoyed my stay at MOunts Bay waters Close to all the great locations - Barrack Street Jetty,Kings park next door to Kings Park, adjacent to the river, just the right distance from the City centre, The Cat bus stop right outside the hotel entrance. Service could not be faulted and prices for meals are well priced compared to other Perth hotels Great option for breakfast Recomeded

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our apartment was one under the top floor and was facing the river and skyline, it was amazing.
reviews.title: we loved it
Walking distance to Perth CBD, cramped as long term accom.
reviews.text: The 2 bedroom apartment was huge, large kitchen, dining area, lounge area and bathroom. Bedroom itself was a standard size but with a nice king size bed-what I needed while on business travel!

There was a balcony which was a good size but as I said, as this was facing the skyline it was great to sit out in the evening. Although I was on the front of the building there was not noise at night ( was not there during the day)The apartment had everything you can imagine, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer, iron and board, hairdryer etc..All cutlery and crockery, pans, knives...there is nothing you would have to ask for.Great location about 6 minutes walk to our company office in St george Terrace.Nice breakfast.
reviews.title: good business hotel in Perth

reviews.text: I would recommend this apartment hotel and it was GREAT value for money due to location, size, cleanliness and hospitality. .
reviews.title: good City location,very great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here for about a month when moving to Perth, in a 2 bedroom unit.
reviews.title: great palce in the city center

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we did enjoyed our 3 nights stay in Mounts Bay Waters Apartment hotel in the Perth central area. The 1 bedroom apartment we had had a great views over the city and the Swan River was quite and well maintained. A spacious yupe of accommodation with full kitchen and internal laudry. Nice size veranda for my husband smoking and quite a wide range of facitities (pool, tennis court, gym restaurant etc). The rate we got on the hotel website was quite good and all in all we had a great stay in this hotel
reviews.title: good location and facilities in Perth City

reviews.text: I stayed here in early June with 3 teenagers who were participating in a school excursion. I chose these apartments on merit, wanting a central location for the students to access the city (The main station is actually near by) & for me to lug my shopping bags home easily (which I did on many occasions).
reviews.title: great family stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I requested & was allotted a 2 bedroom family apartment, on the 7th floor which had a balcony & views from the living area over the river .A flatscreen TV in the lounge area quite large bedroom meant I could have some personal space while the teenagers watched the big TV in the living area.
reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise!

reviews.text: We had an extra wheel-in bed which was a good size & very comfortable.
reviews.title: very nice place!!!

reviews.text: The kitchen was serviceable with full size fridge, microwave, stove, oven, dishwasher & well stocked crockery & utensils, the laundry separate with washing machine & dryer. There was a constant supply of detergents etc unlike other apartments I have stayed in.
reviews.title: great Perth city place to stay

reviews.text: we usually stay in an hotel in the city but as our 2 daughters came with us this time we decided to stay in a central serviced apartment hotel.We were very pleased with our accommodation while sharing a 2 bedroom apartmen in Mounts bay waters. Nice modern apartment, nice breakfast and free sexcurity car parking. The location was very central and the rate very good as we did not have to take 2 hotel rooms- recomended
reviews.title: great stay for our family
Stayed here for a Conference
reviews.text: Overall the experience was pretty good. I had asked for a kingsize bedroom apartment and they gave me a two bedroom apartment on a lower level. Bit disappointed as I had booked well in advance. Did end up with two bathrooms though - when my husband joined me at least we had one each. Could use a bit better touch in the bathrooms as they are looking a bit tired. The staff at Breakfast were very nice as we're the number of people on the desk I spoke to. The Internet connection/charges are not worth the money. Best thing is the location though as just around the corner is Jacobs Ladder (260 steps) that lead to Kings Park- beautiful morning walk with views over Perth. Bottle shop on the corner which my husband was pleased to see. Accommodation in Perth is expensive etc - but would still recommend this if attending the Convention Centre as its an easy walk.

The location was just great on the edge of Perth CBD and walking distance to Kings Gardens and the central city area.Quite spacious and nicely decorated 2 bedroom apartment which accommodate all 4 of us.Great on site gym & tennis court. Good restaurant open for nice breakfast & dinner. Reasonably priced
reviews.title: great location and facilities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After seeing few reviews from fellow travellers on this apartment hotel in Perth we had to book this serviced apartment for our Perth trip.
reviews.title: staisfactory stay in Perth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our apartment was nice, spacious, new, terrace balcony and all proper utensils in the room. It certainly a nice set up for a 1 bedroom hotel apartment.
reviews.title: very central full service apartment hotel

description: Mounts Bay Waters Apartment Hotel is situated in the secluded Mounts Bay Village; a sanctuary of landscaped gardens complimented by swimming pools, tennis courts and furnished apartments. The village is located between Kings Park and the Swan River and is the perfect vantage point from where to base your stay in Perth.With the free CAT bus service stopping right outside the village, this allows you the freedom to explore the City easily although for those who enjoy the walk, we are only ten minutes from the bustling CBD or five minutes from the Perth Convention Centre.This contemporary apartment Hotel comprises of one, two and three bedroom, fully self-contained apartments and penthouses which address most of our clients’ needs so whether you are on vacation, relocation, a business trip or just a leisurely break from routine, Mounts Bay Waters Apartment Hotel is your ideal accommodation choice when visiting Perth.
